headline: BD business split ‘may prefigure’ life sciences division selloff
summary: GlobalData’s director of therapy research & analysis in medical devices says the new entity could make an attractive acquisition target.

headline: Becton Dickinson price target raised to $269 from $265 at BofA
summary: BofA analyst Travis Steed raised the firm’s price target on Becton Dickinson (BDX) to $269 from $265 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares after the company reported fiscal Q1 EPS and announced its intent to separate the Biosciences and Diagnostic Solutions business. The “spin math” suggests a sum-of-the-parts value of $269 per share for the two pieces in total, but a potential sale “could drive even more value creation,” the analyst tells investors.
